$$
p^*(\phi \mid \sigma_u^2,\beta,y)
\;\propto\;
\underbrace{\exp\!\Bigl\{-\tfrac1{2\sigma_u^2}\bigl[(1-\phi^2)\,\varepsilon_1^2 + \sum_{t=2}^T(\varepsilon_t - \phi\,\varepsilon_{t-1})^2\bigr]\Bigr\}}_{\text{kernel of likelihood}}
\;\times\;
\underbrace{(1+\phi)^{f_0-\tfrac12}(1-\phi)^{h_0-\tfrac12}}_{\text{prior in }\phi}.
$$
